pageContext.claim: “Elijah Cummings [a Democratic representative from Maryland] was in my office and he said, 'You will go down as one of the great presidents in the history of our country.'”
pageContext.analysis: Cummings said this is a misquote. He says he told Trump that "he could be a great president if … if … he takes steps to truly represent all Americans rather than continuing on the divisive and harmful path he is currently on.”
